RelatedSentence: At a meeting with the head of the Jordanian - Indonesian parliamentary group and the accompanying delegation currently visiting the Kingdom , Safadi stressed the strong ties between the two countries in the parliamentary , economic and cultural fields as well as the need to further develop them .

At a meeting with the head of the Jordanian - Indonesian parliamentary group and the accompanying delegation currently visiting the Kingdom , Safadi stressed the strong ties between the two countries in the parliamentary , economic and cultural fields as well as the need to further develop them .

RelatedSentence: The two sides affirmed the need to coordinate stances between the two countries ' parliaments at all international forums , mainly on the Palestinian issue .
